entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
